name: Ring Ball
description:
Ring Ball is a simple game where your goal is to bounce balls of a ring that you are controlling! Make sure to only bounce them off the green part of your ring or you will be given a strike! When you do bounce them off the green you are given a point!

Note: This game is in BETA! Currently there is no audio, that will be added eventually. There may be some bugs, if you find any please let me know!
